TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_talakaway_ku_idang_a_imelang, title = talakaway_ku_idang_a_imelang, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/talakaway_ku_idang_a_imelang} }

S.FORM: kakiliman alakaway ku idang a imelang(nu Amilika a kamu:Hypartension, high blood pressure) u talakaway ku idang caay kaadih ku i hekalay a wayway, nika sa anu matenes talakaw kya idang u a imelang, kahung a masatedep ku sinduw, mapilpil ku balucu', i lilisay mutiywngay a ulat maesut, nipiadih caay kakapah, mahaymaway a imelang nu buwa' atu mahedaway ku punuw namin a imelang u sakatalawan cuduh nu idang anu epunan sa, a malatusa anu miditeksa a melawan ku nipitiyuwng nu sindu tu heci, anu mapepec mucudu, anu mabuhat mucudu uyni ku aadihan u mahpecay a nicudu u satabakiyay a niditek anu mabuhatay a nicudu u saadidiway aniditek u yadahay a babalaki i pahanhan i kahepecan mucudu itida i 100 130 (duma a ngangan mmHg), anu kabuhatan nicuduh sa i 60 80 . anu cudu nu idang matulin mulawit tu130 80 atu 140 90 a kaysi talakaway nu cudu nu idang nu wawa han tu aadihan caay kalecad tu babalaki, anu muditek tu cudu nu idang sa, aw 24 tatukiyan ku laeday a muculilay a sapiditek tu cudu nu idang (duma ngngan ABPM) kina mahiniya a mayda nu aadihan tu misaydan muditak tu cudu nu idang( OBPM) a kiyadahan ku mieciyuw. ( :Hypertension high blood pressure) . , , , , , , . . 100 130 ( mmHg) 60 80 . 130 80 140 90 . . 24 ( ABPM) ( OBPM) .
